sentences.english: Using relatively density one can distinguish easily between jadeite and nephrite.
sentences.chinese: 利用相对密度可以很容易区分翡翠和软玉。

sentences.english: The mechanism of thermal transformation for nephrite cat's eye are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 并对软玉猫眼的热相变反应机制进行了探讨。

sentences.english: Nephrite deposits in Qinghai Province have occurred in contact belt between intermediate-acidic intrusive rocks and dolomite-marble.
sentences.chinese: 青海软玉矿床产于中酸性侵入岩与大理岩接触带中。

sentences.english: Oh, you want some sweet talk?
sentences.chinese: 哦，你想听温香软玉的话？

sentences.english: This paper deals with the thermal stability of nephrites in terms of DTA and TGA.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用差热与热重分析研究了软玉的热稳定性。

sentences.english: Oh, how you tease me with your sweet talk.
sentences.chinese: 哦，你为什么总是用温香软玉的话挑逗我？

sentences.english: The nephrite in Qinghai occurs within the internal contact zone between granite and marble.
sentences.chinese: 青海软玉产于花岗岩与大理岩的内接触带。

definition: sheep-fat white jade, a type of jade
Karakax County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang
a jade worker/a jade statuette/a beautiful person/(term of endearment)
jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
Baiyü county (Tibetan: dpal yul rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
